item.title: Back to Trunk - the path of the Continuous Delivery
item.description: Deploy continuously, move faster. Why? Won’t things break? What are the benefits for the teams and their stakeholders? Do those also apply to the “deep” back-end systems? At bol.com (one of the biggest online retailers of the Netherlands), feature teams enjoy lots of autonomy. We can press the “deploy” button at any moment. Theoretically. Practically, there are non-technical obstacles, like: “testing isn’t complete, the rest of the changes must wait.
